Change Log
==========
1.0.2 (28/10/2022)
- Object/Memory optimization
- Supress any error by returning error message
- Better retry mechanism
- Change the default query to match the anilist website


1.0.1 (23/06/2022)
- Add rate limit(too many request) handler

1.0.0 (31/08/2021)
------------------
- First Release
